channel.title: Unhiding client files
channel.description: Hey guys so i just dled silabsoft's client and i plan on making allstar better then it used to be but anyways the client only shows the run file and thats it so yea how do i unhide the files

item.title: Unhiding client files
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

silabsoft client is currently down last time I heard the silabsoft maker talk it sounded like he got sued by runescape and they made them shut the client down the owner promised he would come back with his client one day but it’s been a year or so now so I don’t know

Read full topic

item.title: Unhiding client files
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:4, topic:426883”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=529582.msg3865203#msg3865203 date=1324947882]
Well aren’t we the little reverse engineer! I might be wrong, but I think reverse engineering is against the rules.
[/quote]

Isn’t the community based on the reverse engineering of Jagex’s clients? It would be hypocrisy to have that rule.[/quote]
It’s not even a rule, he just made it up. You’re right though, it’s not even our code.

Read full topic

item.title: Unhiding client files
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Chingchong123:

Hey guys so i just dled silabsoft’s client and i plan on making allstar better then it used to be but anyways the client only shows the run file and thats it so yea how do i unhide the files

Assuming you’re OS is Windows 7, here
http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-vista/Show-hidden-files

Next time try google please. If the files are .class, download a decompiler (DJ Java Decompiler is most recommended) and leech the files you want.

Read full topic
